name: IT'S COMING (CrimsongCat)
description:
"Its Coming"

"Every night from now. It will come to haunt you."

"Luckily for you, if you follow this instructions, It will go away"

Controls

WASD - Move
Space - Jump
LCtrl - Crouch
E -Interact
LClick - Use Item
Numbers - Switch Items

Submission for the #32bitjam
